articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed despite tariff uncertainty and recession fears in the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: Economists polled by Reuters expect India's inflation rate to slow to 3.98% in February from 5.68% in January.
articles.content: Asia-Pacific markets were mixed on Wednesday, after all three benchmarks on Wall Street whipsawed on uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans and fears of a recession in the world'… [+5203 chars]
